product_details.name: Retro Chic Mustard Ribbed Sweater Dress with Glitter Boots
product_details.description:
• Premium ribbed knit fabric in stunning mustard yellow
• Versatile mock turtleneck design for elegant styling
• Form-fitting silhouette with midi length cut
• Long sleeves with comfortable stretch material
• Convenient chest pocket detail
• Perfect for fall/winter seasonal wear
• Pairs beautifully with statement accessories
• Machine washable, easy-care fabric
• Available in sizes XS-XL
• Matching sparkle ankle boots with block heel sold separately
• Ideal for both casual and semi-formal occasions
• Contemporary vintage-inspired design

banner_details:
The banner features a bold and stylish promotional design centered around a fashion product. The background consists of layered circular shapes and fluid curves in varying opacities, creating a modern, abstract look with a radiant purple gradient. A female model image appears prominently in the center, popping against the vibrant purples. At the top, a bold heading (`heading`) communicates the theme, with a minimalist subheading (`subheading`) below it for added context. The price tag (`price`) is highlighted boldly in yellow with a currency symbol. Beneath it, a prominent call-to-action button (`cta`) with a yellow rectangular background (`cta_background`) draws attention to "Shop Now".

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Violet (#2B2449)
- Royal Purple (#3D2F6F)
- Lavender Purple (#654EA3)
- Bright Yellow (#FFD54F)
- Warm Amber (#FFC107)
- Rich Brown (#D4A017)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a vibrant autumnal color palette, centered around a rich mustard yellow dress (#D4A019), which dominates the visual and evokes warmth and confidence. This bold hue is complemented by playful, multicolored sunglasses that introduce accents of pastel pink (#E6B5D0), green (#7CC369), yellow (#FFD700), and purple (#B299D4), adding a fun, pop-art vibe. The glittery gray ankle boots (#A9A9A9) ground the look with a neutral sparkle that balances the vivid tones. Blonde hair (#D2A86E) and natural makeup tones create harmony across the palette. Together, these colors are blended thoughtfully but still retain distinction, making each hue stand out confidently.
